tool_description: Processes multiple media items in batch to generate, optimize, and validate alternative text efficiently for large-scale content operations.

media_urls.description: Array of URLs or file paths to media items

media_types.description: Array of media types corresponding to each URL

max_alt_text_length.description: Maximum character length for generated alt text (50-250)

skip_errors.description: Whether to continue processing if individual items fail

include_validation.description: Whether to include WCAG validation in batch processing

error_messages: Invalid media arrays: media_urls and media_types arrays must have the same length (1-100 items).
Invalid processing mode: Use one of [fast, standard, comprehensive].
Invalid output format: Use one of [json, csv, xml].
Invalid max_alt_text_length: Value must be between 50 and 250.
Batch processing failed: Too many individual items failed to process.
Resource limit exceeded: Batch size or processing requirements exceed system limits.
usage: Provide media_urls and media_types arrays of equal length. Optionally configure processing_mode, output_format, max_alt_text_length, skip_errors, and include_validation. The tool processes all items and returns comprehensive results.

total_processed.description: Total number of items successfully processed

total_failed.description: Total number of items that failed processing

results.description: Generated alt text for each successfully processed item

validation_scores.description: WCAG compliance scores for each item (if validation enabled)

failed_items.description: URLs or identifiers of items that failed processing

summary_report.description: Executive summary of batch processing results
